name: Project Survland
description:
Controls:

W, A, S, D --> Move

E --> Inventory

C --> Craft

F --> Shoot

Q --> Tool

R --> Special Item

T --> Rest in Tent

DOBLE CLICK TO EQUIP!!

There are no sounds YET, some animation, panels and game mechanics are missing or are WIPs. Also, the game isn't balanced yet. sorry if you can't get all the materials at first :(, you can spam the tent rest to get at night soon and loot the enemies.

This is a little Survival I did for class work by my own. This is what It's done for now, hope you find it entertaining :D!!
